REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A f1263 reute r f BC-FINAL-TERMS-SET-ON-AT 04-08 0067

TEXT.TITLE: FINAL TERMS SET ON ATARI CORP CONVERTIBLE EUROBOND
TEXT.BODY: The coupon on the 75 mln dlr, 15-year, convertible eurobond for Atari Corp has been set at 5-1/4 pct compared with indicated range of five to 5-1/4 pct, lead manager Paine Webber International said. The conversion price was set at 32-5/8 dlrs, representing a premium of 20.38 pct over yesterday's Atari share close of 27 dlrs. REUTER
